operationId GetCertificate
parameters
name stackid

required True
description A stack ID or slug
schema
type string
name certificateid
in path
required True
description A certificate ID
schema
type string
summary Get a certificate
responses
200
certificateGetCertificateResponse
type object
certificateCertificate
type object
properties
stackId
type string
description The certificates associated stack ID
id
type string
description The certificates ID
hosts
type string
description A list of certificate SAN hosts
issuer
type string
description The authority who issued the certificate
certificate
type string
description The certificates PEM PKCS #7 formatted contents
caBundle
type string
description A PEM PKCS #7 formatted certificate authority bundle
certificateCertificateStatus
type string
default UNKNOWN
description A SSL Certificate Status

 UNKNOWN The status is currently unknown
  PENDING The certificate is currently pending issuance
  COMPLETE The certificate has been issued and can be downloaded
  EXPIRED The certificate expriation date has passed
  FAILED An error has prevented the certificate from being issued
  PENDINGVERIFICATION The certificate has begun processing and is currently waiting for host verification to complete
  REVOKED The certificate was revoked with the ssl provider
  READY The certificate has been issued but has not been downloaded yet Not currenly in use
  REPLACED The certificate has been replaced by either a host update or a renewal
expiresAt
type string
format datetime
description The date the certificate will expire and the status updated to EXPIRED
createdAt
type string
format datetime
description The date the certificate was created
updatedAt
type string
format datetime
description The last time a certificate was updated by the provisioning process
certificateCertificateStatusDetails
type object
verificationFailures
type array
certificateCertificateVerificationFailure
type object
properties
domain
type string
description The host the verification failed on
details
type string
description Detailed information about the failure
checkedAt
type string
format datetime
description The last time the failure was detected
description A record that indicates why a domain is failing SSL validation
description Failures preventing the certificate from being issued
description Detailed certificate status
